title: Vivarium's Art Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=4]]

[[=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]

Upvote Vivarium... please. <3

[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/=]]

[[=image VIVA.png]]

Hello, and welcome to my collection of things! I didn't intend to make this, but I guess I make art now so... here we are. Take a look, and have an excellent day.

[[=]]
+* My Things!
[[/=]]

-----

||~ Icon ||~ Comments ||
||  [[image BeholderProgram.gif width="250 px"]] || **The Beholder Program:** The logo for The Beholder Program, the main focus of [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/into-the-void-hub | this hub]]].||
||  [[image BinaryStar.gif width="250 px"]] || **Binary Star:** What the AI from [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5857 | this article]]] looks like.||
||  [[image Tau15Logo.png width="250 px"]] || **MTF Tau-15 "Vanguard":** A logo made for the MTF featured [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp6000contestdrlerche | here]]].||
||  [[image Wandsmen_Invert.png width="250 px"]] || **The Wandsmen:** A logo made for the GOI [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/wandsmen-hub | The Wandsmen]]].||
